answers.author: Pamela Muse
answers.text:
Hi Grace - yes, once you're registered as an Alliance member in the Knowledge Network, you can click on the AFI link from the homepage and access their grant services.  It typically takes a few hours to populate your information once you've registered.  
Let me know if you need anything else.  
Pamela Muse  
Western Regioal Director  
888-468-6450  
pmuse@transformgov.org

author: Grace Kelly
text:
Hello, I am a new user to the Alliance for Innovation and work for the City of Tempe.
Scott Frost, CEO of American Funding Innovators emailed us and said Alliance for Innovation and American Funding Innovators are corporate partners, and as such, Tempe employees have free access to the search database for grants.  I think it is called grantnavigator.   How do I access this grants database?
title: Grantnavigator question
